problem: Charlie is a tennis pro.  He spends most of the day teaching others lessons on how to improve their game.  His standard fee is $5923892 per hour for lessons, but he reduces his rate by 25% when he is giving lessons to a veteran.   If today Charlie has 4 1-hour lessons at his standard rate and 2 1-hour lessons with a veteran, what is the total amount of money he will make for the day, in dollars?
